I developed a tool for the recycler to put into the middle slot.
It consists of cameras and a laser which precisely cuts the workpiece. This process is versatile, but it quadruples the energy requirements.

This tool features many recipes, among others: 
 -all products of the Assembly Table 
 -Horse Armor 
 -products of the "Decorations"-tab (uncolored if possible) 
 -Iron Bars, Minecart, Buckets 
 -more
